entries.name: new(list=nil, order = DENY_ALLOW)
entries.desc: Creates a new ACL from list with an evaluation order of DENY_ALLOW or ALLOW_DENY.

entries.name: allow_addr?(addr)
entries.desc: Allow connections from addrinfo addr?  It must be formatted like Socket#peeraddr:

entries.name: install_list(list)
entries.desc: Adds list of ACL entries to this ACL.
